content: **drops crochet shawl in vivaldi with rosette in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** width at top approx 152 cm / 59-7/8 length at center back approx 76 cm / 29-7/8 **materials** drops vivaldi from garnstudio 100 gr nr 02 brown and use drops snow from garnstudio 100 gr nr 20 lilac 100 gr nr 32 dark purple drops 4 mm / us g and 6 mm / us j crochet hooks or sizes needed to obtain correct gauge crochet gauge 1 square= approx 27 x 27 cm / 10 5 x 10 5
